Description: Lorenzo, 45 years old, lives in his own house with his mother and his brother.  He has made a living growing corn for 20 years.  He sells his products in the adjacent towns and has established customers.  With the profits he earns, he manages to offset some of the household expenses.  He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, etc., so that he is able to continue with his work to have better profits.
Use: to purchase seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, etc.
Keywords:
The most relevant keywords for this loan request are:

1.  **Sustainable Agriculture**: The agricultural inputs the loan will provide—seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, and pesticides—will help the borrower continue with his work and generate more profit.
2.  **Corn**: Corn is the flagship crop for the borrower, so the loan's purpose is directly related to corn farming.
3.  **Household Expenses**: Some of the profits the loan generates will be used to offset household expenses for the borrower and his family.
4.  **Family**: The borrower lives in the same estate with his mother and his brother.
